jd: From: Tushar Chauhan, CCIT tushar@ccitinc.com Reply to: tushar@ccitinc.com Hello,Please find the job description of Project ManagerJob Title: Project ManagerType: 6mon Contract (with possible extension)Location: Dallas, TX (Hybrid, 3 Days Onsite)Visa: USC/GC Candidates Job Description: Responsibilities:The Client is looking for a project manager with extensive data analytics experience to support telecom network deployment projects. The ideal candidate will have strong analytical abilities, project management experience, and expertise in data visualization and tracking.Required Skills:One of the main requirements for this position is experience with cellular network deployments.Manage complex projects with multiple stakeholders and dependencies, ensuring coordination and timely project delivery.Develop dashboards and visual reports using PowerBI, Tableau, or similar tools for tracking project status and key performance indicators (KPIs).Gather, process, and analyze advanced data sets to provide strategic insights, using AI/ML methods where possible, identifying trends, risks, and forecasting project timelines.Track project milestones, manage dependencies, and provide data-driven updates and recommendations to stakeholders.Coordinate and track work from multiple subcontractors and vendors to align project goals and timelines.Oversee material management and logistics, optimizing inventory and resource allocation.Schedule and lead status meetings with stakeholders to provide updates and ensure alignment.Streamline workflow by optimizing processes and establishing new procedures to minimize project inefficiencies.Establish run-rate schedules to meet internal and external project deadlines.Ensure resources are aligned with project goals, identifying and addressing critical resource gaps with management.Collaborate with management, RF engineering, and site acquisition teams to ensure project alignment with technical requirements and site development timelines.Engage stakeholders to implement corrective actions to mitigate project delays and risks. Thanks & RegardsTushar Chauhantushar@ccitinc.com+1 (248)301-2788
